version_description:
·Added 3 new random bosses: [GOLEM], [WIND GOD] and [ABYSSAL SERPENT].
·Added 12 new weapons.
·Added 31 new scrolls.
·Added a few random routes in some levels.
·Added Controller Hotkey Mapping function. Once the mobile device successfully  detects and matches the controller, player can use the controller to simulate screen controls in game.
